item.title: Misc.Random Help :)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

add this in item.java:

        public static int Holiday[] = {6856,6857,6858,6859,6860,6861,6862,6863};

        public static int randomHoliday()
        {
            return Holiday[(int)(Math.random()*Holiday.length)];

next go to client.java and go to that code, and replace it with:

if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 946 || itemUsed == 946 && usedWith

== 1755)        //Christmas Cracker {
addItem(Item.randomHoliday(), 1);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Misc.Random Help :)
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

What have I done wrong here? It’s only giving me Red Partyhat?

if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 946 || itemUsed == 946 && usedWith 

== 1755)	//Christmas Cracker {

 player.partyhat = Misc.random(5); 

if (player.partyhat == 0) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1038, 1); 
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] Red Partyhat!");
} else if (player.partyhat == 1) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1040, 1); 
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] Yellow Partyhat!");
} else if (player.partyhat == 2) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1042, 1); 
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] Blue Partyhat!");
} else if (player.partyhat == 3) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1044, 1); 
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] Green Partyhat!");
} else if (player.partyhat == 4) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1046, 1); 
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] Purple Partyhat!");
} else if (player.partyhat == 5) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(player, 1048, 1);
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You recieve a [x1] White Partyhat!");
}

Read full topic
